response.overview: The Seventh Circle follows Emma and Louise, who find themselves soaked and disoriented at the entrance of what they believe is a hidden bar. They descend into a surreal and sinister journey through various rooms, symbolising one of the seven deadly sins. They face moral dilemmas, temptations, and psychological torment, and their friendship is put to the test. To escape, they must resist the darkness within and rely on and forgive each other.
response.title: The Seventh Circle
